p: Previously, three new 24-noroleanane triterpenoids, 2a,19a-dihydroxy-3-oxo-24-norolean-12- en-28-oic acid, 19a-hydroxy-3-oxo-24-norolean-12-en-28-oic acid, and 2a,3b,19a-trihydroxy-24-norolean-12-en-28-oic acid ( Figure 1(d)), were also isolated from Q. aliena var. acuteserrata, with previously known compounds (bartogenic acid, ilexgenin, and aophitolic acid) [ 88]. The chemical structures of the bioactive compounds of Quercus species are shown in Figure 3.
